verbs.description: social media posts admissible in court [ARG1: what] [ARG0: you] [V: say] [ARGM-LOC: on facebook] can be used against you in a court of law whether it a divorce proceeding or criminal trial posts on social networking sites such as facebook myspace twitter and skype are regularly popping up as evidence in courtrooms locally and across the country ohio association of criminal defense attorneys court social media twitter ian friedman facebook lance tiernan mike gmoser butler county ohio social networking social networking sites
